text: June 1 , 1998 BOYS & Girls Club OF INDIANAPOLIS Dear Friend , It 's summertime , so it must be time for CAMP ! Yes , it 's that time of the year -- the start of the Boys & Girls clubs of Indianapolis ' Camp . Six weeks of learning and exploring , sports , arts , and fellowship . A time for a youngster to enjoy the fun and benefits of residential camp living , dedicated staff and instruction , and a chance to make special friends .
